text:
Nectar | Lead Software Developer | Montreal, QC | Full-Time, On-Site

https://www.nectar.buzz/careers/

Nectar is giving bees a voice through helping beekeepers better manage their apiary and collecting data on beehive dynamics.

We are looking for an experienced (5+) Montreal based web developer that will enable scaling the tech team.

Tech fields: Web development, IOT, Data processing Tech stack: Node.js, Python
